snippet: World number three Stan Wawrinka beat Roberto Bautista Agut 7-6(8) 6-2 on Saturday and will play Alexander Zverev in the St. Petersburg Open final....
lead_paragraph: World number three Stan Wawrinka beat Roberto Bautista Agut 7-6(8) 6-2 on Saturday and will play Alexander Zverev in the St. Petersburg Open final.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka and Zverev to Meet in St. Petersburg Open Final
headline.main: Wawrinka and Zverev to Meet in St. Petersburg Open Final
